tasks.label: turbo: build-deps-and-compile
args: cd '${workspaceFolder}' && source $NVM_DIR/nvm.sh && nvm use && cd ../../ && pnpm turbo run build

tasks.label: extension-only-compile
args: cd '${workspaceFolder}' && source $NVM_DIR/nvm.sh && nvm use && pwd && echo 'Current directory contents:' && ls -la src/propertiesViewProvider.ts && echo 'Cleaning and compiling extension only...' && rm -rf dist/* && pnpm compile && echo 'Checking compiled file...' && grep -n GOLF dist/extension.js && echo 'Extension compiled successfully'
